AD.name: Result Count
AD.description: Specifies the number of results to request from each source.

AD.name: Export Result Limit
AD.description: Specifies the max number of results that can be exported.

AD.name: Required Export Attributes
AD.description: Specifies the attributes that must be included in exports. These attributes will always by displayed in the inspector (summary shown) as well.

AD.name: Export Metacard Format Options
AD.description: Specifies the export format options available for export of a single metacard. This should be a comma separated list. Valid options are: audio, csv, csw:Record, deployed-harvested-resource, geojson, gmd:MD_Metadata, html, kml, kmz, resource, rtf, thumbnail, txt, xlsx, xml.

AD.name: Export Multiple Metacard Format Options
AD.description: Specifies the export format options available for export of multiple metacards. This should be a comma separated list. Valid options are: atom, csv, csw:Record, geojson, kml, kmz, xml, html, rtf, xlsx.

AD.name: Imagery Providers
AD.description: List of imagery providers to use. Valid types are: OSM (OpenStreetMap), AGM (ArcGisMap), BM (BingMap), WMS (WebMapService), WMT (WebMapTile), TMS (TileMapService), and GE (GoogleEarth). Example: {"name": "Example OSM", "show": true, "type": "OSM", "url": "http://a.tile.openstreetmap.org", "fileExtension": "png", "order": 0, "alpha": 1, "proxyEnabled": false}.

AD.name: Terrain Provider
AD.description: Terrain provider to use for height data. Valid types are: CT (CesiumTerrain), AGS (ArcGisImageServer), and VRW (VRTheWorld). Example: {"type": "CT", "url": "http://example.com"}.

AD.name: Default Layout
AD.description: The default UI layout and visualization configuration used in the Catalog UI. See http://golden-layout.com/docs/Config.html for more information. Example: [{"type": "stack", "content": [{"type": "component", "component": "cesium", "componentName": "cesium", "title": "3D Map"}, {"type": "component", "component": "inspector", "componentName": "inspector", "title": "Inspector"}]}].

AD.name: Visualizations
AD.description: Visualizations that should be recognized by golden layout in Admin UI. Example: [{"name":"openlayers","title":"2D Map","icon":"map"},{"name":"cesium","title":"3D Map","icon":"globe"},{"name":"inspector","title":"Inspector","icon":"info"},{"name":"histogram","title":"Histogram","icon":"bar-chart"},{"name":"table","title":"Table","icon":"table"}]

AD.name: Map Projection
AD.description: Projection of imagery providers (e.g. "EPSG:3857", "EPSG:4326").

AD.name: Bing Maps Key
AD.description: Bing Maps API key. This should only be set if you are using Bing Maps Imagery or Terrain Providers.

AD.name: Connection Timeout
AD.description: Specifies the client-side connection timeout in milliseconds.

AD.name: Source Poll Interval
AD.description: Specifies the interval to poll for sources in milliseconds.

AD.name: Show Sign In
AD.description: Allow Sign In to Search UI and welcome notice. Enable this if the Search UI is protected.

AD.name: Show Tasks
AD.description: Show task menu area for long running actions.

AD.name: Show Gazetteer
AD.description: Show gazetteer for searching place names.

AD.name: Use Online Gazetteer
AD.description: Should the online gazetteer be used? If unchecked a local gazetteer service will be used. This only applies to the search gazetteer in Intrigue.

AD.name: Enable Cache
AD.description: Locally cached results will be returned in search results.

AD.name: Enable Web Sockets
AD.description: Enables use of Web Sockets

AD.name: Enable Local Catalog
AD.description: Enables queries to the local catalog.

AD.name: Enable Experimental Features
AD.description: WARNING: Enables experimental features in the UI. This allows users to preview upcoming features.

AD.name: Show Relevance Scores
AD.description: Toggle the display of relevance scores of search results.

AD.name: Relevance Score Precision
AD.description: Set the number of digits to display in for each relevance score. The default is 5 (i.e. 12.345).

AD.name: Show Logo in Title Bar
AD.description: Toggles the visibility of the logo in the menu bar.

AD.name: Enable Unknown Error Box
AD.description: Enable Unknown Error Box visibility.

AD.name: Enable Metacard Preview
AD.description: Enable Metacard Preview in the Inspector.

AD.name: Enable Spellcheck
AD.description: Enable Spellcheck for searches.

AD.name: Enable Similar Word Matching
AD.description: Enable phonetic and synonym matching for text searches.

AD.name: Enable Fuzzy Results
AD.description: Enables result count approximations.

AD.name: Show Custom Text Notations
AD.description: Toggle the display of custom text notations next to metacard map markers.

AD.name: Custom Text Notation Attribute
AD.description: Set the metacard attribute to display next to the map markers. The default is 'title'.

AD.name: Basic Search Temporal Selections
AD.description: Enable Basic Search Temporal Selections.

AD.name: Basic Search Match Type Metacard Attribute
AD.description: Metacard attribute used for Basic Search Type Match. Make sure to add this attribute to the Facet Attribute Whitelist.

AD.name: Type Name Mapping
AD.description: Mapping of display names to content types in the form name=type.

AD.name: Read Only Metacard Attributes
AD.description: List of metacard attributes that are read-only. NOTE: the provided values will be evaluated as JavaScript regular expressions when matched against metacard attributes.

AD.name: Summary Metacard Attributes (Inspector)
AD.description: List of metacard attributes to display in the summary (inspector) view by default.

AD.name: Icon Configuration
AD.description: List of icon configurations. Each entry is of the form [datatype]=[fa icon code],[unicode],[font],[size]

AD.name: Result Preview Metacard Attributes
AD.description: List of metacard attributes to display in the result preview.

AD.name: Query Schedule Frequencies
AD.description: Custom list of schedule frequencies in seconds. This will override the frequency list in the query schedule tab. Leave this empty to use the frequency list on the Catalog UI.

AD.name: Maximum Endpoint Upload Size
AD.description: The maximum size (in bytes) to allow per client when receiving a POST/PATCH/PUT. Note: This does not affect product upload size, just the maximum size allowed for calls from Intrigue.

AD.name: Map Home
AD.description: Specifies the default home view for the map by bounding box. The format is "West, South, East, North", where North, East, South, and West are coordinates in degrees. An example is: "-124, 60, -100, 40".

AD.name: Upload Editor: Attribute Configuration
AD.description: List of attributes to show in the upload editor. By default, an attribute may be assigned any text value. Entries of the form 'attribute=value_1,...,value_n' will restrict input to the listed values.

AD.name: Upload Editor: Required Attributes
AD.description: List of attributes which must be set before an upload is permitted. If an attribute is listed as required but not shown in the editor, it will be ignored.

AD.name: Default Sources
AD.description: List of default sources for use in queries

AD.name: Default Table Columns
AD.description: List of default columns for the table visualization
